attributes.action: Annul the EU Referendum as the guidance to the electorate was misleading.
attributes.additional_details:
A) The Leave campaign bus slogan;
B) The implication that by voting Leave immigration would be restricted.
attributes.background: The outcome was significantly influenced by misleading and inaccurate data, for example reducing immigration and making available funds for the NHS.  Politicians and other professionals have a duty to provide accurate, honest and reliable information to guide the electorate.
